properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

Welcome to this opulent six-bedroom residence priced at $1,850,000, a pinnacle of luxury living. The grand foyer leads to a sophisticated interior with high ceilings and custom finishes. The gourmet kitchen, adorned with top-tier appliances, is a culinary masterpiece. Six spacious bedrooms, including a lavish master suite, provide ample space. Outside, a meticulously landscaped backyard with a patio offers an ideal setting for outdoor gatherings. This property, located in a prestigious neighborhood, represents the epitome of upscale living, combining elegance with comfort.

Discover the charm of this enchanting five-bedroom cottage priced at $1,000,000. Nestled in a picturesque setting, this residence exudes warmth and character. With rustic details and modern comforts, the cottage offers a perfect blend of classic and contemporary. The surrounding landscape enhances the tranquility, providing a serene escape. Priced attractively at $1,000,000, this five-bedroom cottage is a unique opportunity for those seeking a blend of comfort and timeless appeal in a peaceful setting.

High-end finishes and modern amenities enhance the overall allure. Ideally situated, this property provides convenience and style for those seeking an elevated living experience. Priced competitively at $1,950,000, this four-bedroom apartment represents a unique opportunity for those who appreciate both opulence and comfort in the heart of the city.

Step into the epitome of refined living with this exquisite one-bedroom villa priced at $300,000. Nestled in a serene location, this villa exudes charm and sophistication. With a meticulously landscaped exterior, the villa provides a private oasis for relaxation.
